name: type
description: Identifies the code as an expected 'Question' or 'Answer' code.  'Question' codes are checked against values in observation.observation_source_value.  'Answer' codes are checked against values in observation.value_source_value.

name: pmi_code
description: concept_code in use by the survey administration team.  This code exists in the data but does not have a valid associated concept_id in the vocabulary.

name: short_code
description: Short codes implemented by Odysseus, i.e. they exist in the vocabulary.  The concept_ids associated with these codes are expected to set the values of the observation.observation_concept_id, observation.observation_source_concept_id, observation.value_as_concept_id, and observation.value_source_concept_id fields.
